A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: There are moments I enjoyed but mere moments. What really sticks in the mind upon viewing is the mountain of dropped plots coming out of The Force Awakens\, the cringe-inducing new subplots and the metaphorical rape of Luke Skywalker as a character. This movie has the Star Wars name on it but it doesn't FEEL like Star Wars. It is a funeral for what Star Wars had been. \"Let the past die. Kill it\, if Disney has to.\"
